meanings.definition: In a way that is not usual or common.
meanings.sent1: She spoke unusually softly during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The flowers bloomed unusually early this year.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed unusually loudly for attention.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone unusually bright on that winter day.
meanings.sent5: His laughter echoed unusually in the empty room.

meanings.definition: To a degree that is out of the ordinary.
meanings.sent1: He unusually excelled in his math exam.
meanings.sent2: The team unusually won every game this season.
meanings.sent3: The cake unusually baked itself in the oven.
meanings.sent4: Her voice unusually carried across the entire hall.
meanings.sent5: The idea unusually sparked creativity in everyone.
